options.name: Scroll of Desiccation
options.description: During Pre-game Selections, choose a Field, Forest, or Water Terrain Feature. This Terrain Feature ceases to be the Terrain Feature it used to be and loses all its rules. It is treated as Dangerous Terrain for all enemy units.

options.name: Banner of the Entombed
options.description:
-1.The bearer count towards Entombed.
If taken by a Character, the bearer gains Ambush (Open Terrain). If taken by a Rank-and-File model, the bearer’s unit gains Ambush (Open Terrain) and additional models cannot be added to the unit during Army List creation.

options.name: Bloodless Banner
options.description: Friendly units within 6" of the bearer's unit gain Immune (Poison Attacks).

options.name: Godslayer
options.description:
+1 Att, Divine Attacks, Multiple Wounds (2, towards Aegis (X+)*).
*Note that the latter also applies against models with Aegis Saves with Conditional Applications.

options.name: Scourge of Kings
options.description: Att is set to 6. While the wielder is a Duellist, it gains Zeal.

options.name: Crown of the Pharaohs
options.description: At the start of each of your Player Turns, the bearer may lose Undying Will and choose a friendly unit within 12". This unit gains Undying Will. Both effects have Duration: One Turn.

options.name: Sacred Hourglass
options.description: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell that was targeting a friendly unit, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll.

options.name: Book of the Dead
options.description: The bearer can cast Death is Only the Beginning as a Bound Spell (4+). The spell's Type is changed to: Range 12" and Aura. Note that no increase in Casting Value is required when targeting units with Height 5.

options.name: Steeds of Nephet-Ra
options.description: Skeletal Horse model parts in the bearer's unit gain Ghost Step, Grind Attack (1,Str 3, AP 0, Flaming Attacks).

options.name: Blessed Wrappings
options.description: The bearer gains +1 HP and loses Weakness (Flaming Attacks) if it had it. (Note that this does not prevent the model from gaining Weakness (Flaming Attacks) from other sources).

options.name: Sandstorm Cloak
options.description: The bearer's Mob is set to 8, and it gains Autonomous, Fly, Swiftstride, Sweeping Attack (2D6, Str 2, AP 1).
